document_title: User Manual of PMKSY-Other Interventions| RFS Division
scheme_or_topic: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana Other Interventions
eligibility: Nodal State User has Permission to create State Nodal Users, State Users & District Nodal Users and District users.
how_to_apply: Step 3rd: Create User for State (Nodal Officer).
Step 4th: Create User As a State User (Without Nodal User Permission).
Step 5th: Create User as District Users.
